articles.author: Hans von der Burchard, Joshua Posaner, Nette Nöstlinger
articles.title: Poland's Tusk rails at fractured defense planning in jibe at Germany's Scholz - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Germany is skeptical of common borrowing for defense; Poland wants it.
articles.content:
"In general, Europe is dramatically disoriented," said Tusk. "There is a lack of cooperation."
Poland has rapidly increased its defense spending to 4.12 percent of GDP in 2024 easily beating NATO's … [+1204 chars]

articles.author: Adriana Garcia
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo confirms Euro 2024 will be his last - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has confirmed that the 2024 European Championship in Germany will be "without a doubt" the last of his career.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo confirmed that the European Championship in Germany will be "without a doubt" the last of his impressive career.
